SEO_TITLE: Limber Martinez - AI-Enhanced Full-Stack Developer | Microsoft AI-900 Certified
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Limber Martinez, AI-powered application developer in training at BFW Dortmund. Seeking 6-month internship starting August 2025. Microsoft AI-900 certified with LangChain and OpenAI expertise.

HERO.TITLE: Limber Martinez
HERO.SUBTITLE: AI-Enhanced Full-Stack Developer | Microsoft AI-900 Certified
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Application Developer in training at BFW Dortmund, focusing on AI-powered web solutions. Building intelligent applications with LangChain, OpenAI APIs, and modern AI tools. Seeking 6-month unpaid internship starting August 2025 as part of IHK certification program.

ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_1: Hi, I'm Limber Martinez, a Microsoft AI-900 certified developer currently training as an Application Developer (Fachinformatiker) at BFW Dortmund until July 2026. I focus on creating AI-powered solutions and building intelligent web applications with emphasis on frontend and backend development.
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_2: I have hands-on experience with AI tools like LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Python agents, and modern development tools including Cursor, GitHub Copilot, and VS Code AI features. My core stack includes Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TypeScript, with growing expertise in AI integration and automation.
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_3: I'm seeking a 6-month unpaid internship starting August 2025 in Dortmund and surrounding areas to deepen my knowledge in a practical environment. Passionate about integrating AI into web development and building intelligent applications that solve real-world problems.

EVENTS.TITLE: BFW IT Specialist Application Development IHK
EVENTS.DESCRIPTION: Umschulung (retraining) in application development, providing advanced skills in programming and software development.

EVENTS.TITLE: Microsoft AI-900 Certification
EVENTS.DESCRIPTION: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals certification, covering AI workloads, machine learning principles, computer vision, and conversational AI on Azure.

EVENTS.TITLE: Oracle One Altura Education Program
EVENTS.DESCRIPTION: An intensive program focused on Java and Spring Boot, establishing a solid foundation in backend development.

EVENTS.TITLE: Full Stack Developer Training
EVENTS.DESCRIPTION: Specialization in frontend development with React and Angular at UTN, Argentina, complemented by backend skills with NodeJS.

EVENTS.TITLE: Web Developer Certification
EVENTS.DESCRIPTION: Beginning of my web development journey, covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript at ILS in Hamburg.

PROJECT_LIST.TITLE: AI Document Analysis Agent
PROJECT_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Intelligent document analyzer powered by multiple AI models. Features real-time analysis, risk assessment, compliance checking, and interactive chat. Built with OpenAI and Anthropic APIs.

PROJECT_LIST.TITLE: Email Response Generator
PROJECT_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Professional AI-powered email response generator that analyzes incoming emails and creates contextually appropriate replies in 5 different styles. Perfect for customer service, sales, and business correspondence.

PROJECT_LIST.TITLE: Customer Support Ticket Classifier
PROJECT_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Intelligent AI-powered customer support ticket analysis system that automatically categorizes, prioritizes, and routes tickets. Features sentiment analysis, urgency detection, and actionable insights for support teams.

PROJECT_LIST.TITLE: Integra Care
PROJECT_LIST.DESCRIPTION: A fully responsive, static Astro project with GDPR principles and a PHP contact form, designed for privacy and user-friendliness. Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS, SEO optimized, German legal compliance, and accessibility tools integrated.

PROJECT_LIST.TITLE: KFZ Memmo
PROJECT_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Professional landing page for a car service and vehicle appraisal center in Dortmund. Built with Astro and Tailwind, optimized for SEO and fully responsive.

PROJECT_LIST.TITLE: Fast React Pizza
PROJECT_LIST.DESCRIPTION: A modern pizza delivery application built with React and TypeScript. Features include login, shopping cart, order tracking, and priority delivery system with Redux state management. Data is stored in browser cache/local storage using JSON format, no database implementation.

SKILL_SET.name: AI & Machine Learning
SKILL_SET.description: Microsoft AI-900 certified with hands-on experience in LangChain, OpenAI APIs, and Python AI agents. Developing skills in building intelligent applications and chatbots.

SKILL_SET.name: Modern AI Development Tools
SKILL_SET.description: Proficient with Cursor IDE, GitHub Copilot, VS Code AI extensions, and AI-powered development workflows for enhanced productivity.

SKILL_SET.name: JavaScript & TypeScript
SKILL_SET.description: Strong proficiency in ES6+ features, TypeScript, asynchronous programming, and modern JavaScript frameworks with growing AI integration capabilities.

SKILL_SET.name: React & Modern Frontend
SKILL_SET.description: Experienced in creating SPAs using React, learning to integrate AI components, chatbots, and intelligent user interfaces with modern state management.

SKILL_SET.name: Python & AI Development
SKILL_SET.description: Skilled in Python for AI agent development, API integrations, data processing, and building intelligent backend services.

SKILL_SET.name: Java & Spring Boot
SKILL_SET.description: Solid foundation in Java and Spring Boot for enterprise-level backend applications and RESTful API development.

LEGAL.TITLE: Legal Notice
LEGAL.INTRODUCTION: Welcome to my personal portfolio website. Here, I showcase my programming skills and projects, aiming to connect with potential employers and opportunities in the IT sector. This website serves as a digital resume, not a commercial platform.
LEGAL.CONTENT: Operated by Limber Martinez, this website is a non-commercial personal portfolio. It is designed to present my professional qualifications and projects. For content inquiries, please contact me directly.
LEGAL.ADDITIONAL: Please note that while I ensure all content is accurate, I am not responsible for the content of external websites linked from my portfolio.
LEGAL.COPYRIGHT: Copyright ¬© 2024 Limber Martinez. All rights reserved. Reproduction or distribution of any material from this site without prior permission is strictly prohibited.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.CONTENT: Your privacy is paramount to us. This policy outlines how we handle personal data on this site, dedicated to showcasing my web development skills and connecting with potential employers. This is not a commercial site, and we do not sell products or services.
PRIVACY.DATA_COLLECTION: Data Collection: No personal data is collected directly by this site. However, external tools like Calendly used for scheduling may collect information as per their privacy policies.
PRIVACY.DATA_USAGE: Use of Data: Any data collected by third-party tools is used in accordance with their respective privacy policies. We encourage you to review these policies to understand how your data is handled.
PRIVACY.DATA_PROTECTION: Data Protection: We take precautions to protect your data on platforms we use. However, as we do not collect data directly, we advise reviewing the privacy settings and policies of any third-party tools or services you interact with.
PRIVACY.USER_RIGHTS: Your Rights: Regarding any personal data held by third-party services used on this site, you have rights under GDPR, including access, correction, and deletion. Please contact the respective services directly to exercise these rights.
